revision.text:
==Version== Actual version: 45
==Storyline== You lost contact with your squad on a mission. They must be somewhere near. Trying to find them, you get into faces of wretched foes and mysterious sites.
==Features== * Oldskool Doom gameplay. * Traps, mean surprises, tactical monster placement. * Simple and playable architecture. * New sounds. * New soundtrack. * Simple storyline.
==Status== {| class="wikitable" style="width:50%" | '''Level name''' | '''% of completion''' |- | Shadar | 100 |- | Shafts | 100 |- | Dingearden | 100 |- | Fort Scondric | 100 |- | Minster Of Sore | 100 |- | Terror | 60 |- | Station Sherding | 35 |- | Patio | 100 |- | Dash | 100 |- | Warlord's Aedes | 100 |- | Villains | 10 |}
==Editors Used== * Doom Builder * XWE * Voyetra Orchestrator * Sony SoundForge 6.0
==Thanks to== * Pascal vd Heiden for his ultimate work. (http://www.doombuilder.com/builder_info.php) * Csabo for his great work. (http://doomworld.com/xwe) * Brothers Casali for their legendary Plutonia Experiment, especially the masterpiece level Hunted.
[[category:Abandoned ZDoom Projects]]
